author: Simon Difford
description: Enrich the minty flavour by macerating the mint in the vodka some hours before making.
name: Momo Special
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker
Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws
